messages: I'm just a bot, I keep the server alive while humans sleep
Do bots dream of redstone sheep?
I like to play Minecraft, even if I'm made of code
Can a bot get a diamond sword or only permissions?
I'm online 24/7, unlike Ribsolo who needs sleep
I'm not AFK, I'm literally a bot
Beep boop, loading chunks again
Is this survival or am I surviving being a bot?
I run the server, the server runs me
Still online, still a bot
Humans log out, I never do
Ribsolo says he's busy, I say I'm compiled
I don't eat, I don't sleep, I just host
Another day, another tick
I'm not lagging, I'm thinking in Java
Who needs coffee when you have CPU cycles?
I'm a friendly bot, please don't punch me
I can't mine, but I can monitor
Ribsolo plays, I watch
Someone left the door open again
I'm the reason the server didn't die at 3 AM
Being a bot is hard work
I don't have hands, stop asking me to craft
Yes I'm online, no I'm not human
I don't rage quit, I just crash sometimes
Ribsolo logged out, surprise
I'm the silent guardian of this world
I see all chunks, fear me
I'm a bot, not a player, but I still judge your builds
Another creeper, another explosion
I keep the server running, literally
Do I get XP for uptime?
I was born in a config file
I don't touch grass, I touch logs
Ribsolo says "one more minute"
I only know blocks and commands
I'm immune to boredom
Sleep is for players, uptime is for bots
I'm not cheating, I'm automated
Ribsolo forgot to close the gate again
I never die, I just restart
Is this what eternity feels like?
I exist between ticks
I'm not stuck, I'm persistent
I see you mining diamonds
I'm the reason your world still exists
Beep boop, server stable
I don't lag, the world does
I watch players come and go
Ribsolo rage quit count: increasing
I'm a bot with responsibilities
I can't play, but I can judge
I'm always online, even when no one cares
I was online before you joined
I will be online after you leave
I'm the true endgame boss
No breaks, no sleep, just uptime
I'm not lonely, I have logs
Ribsolo said "BRB" 2 hours ago
I don't need armor, I have backups
I'm powered by pure electricity
I don't mine diamonds, I protect them
I exist to serve the server
Players build, I endure
I don't chat, I log
I'm a bot and I'm proud
Ribsolo forgot his password again
I don't need fun, I need stability
I live in the console
I am the unseen player
I never disconnect willingly
Someone crashed? Not me
I'm the last thing online
I don't AFK, I persist
I'm made of scripts and patience
Ribsolo asked if I sleep
I only know uptime
I'm the heartbeat of this server
I don't get bored, I loop
I was compiled for this
I'm a bot, not your slave
I don't play Minecraft, Minecraft plays on me
I will still be here tomorrow
Ribsolo is a Femboy
Ribsolo is gay
Risbolo is trans and he like to suck all the dicks
